meanings.sent1: The cat was unaggressive towards the mouse, showing no signs of aggression.
meanings.sent2: She had an unaggressive personality, always avoiding conflicts.
meanings.sent3: The unaggressive turtle decided to take a leisurely stroll instead of racing with the others.
meanings.sent4: The unaggressive clouds peacefully floated across the sky, not causing any storms.
meanings.sent5: His unaggressive approach to negotiations made him a calming presence in the room.

meanings.definition: Not engaging in hostile or confrontational behavior.
meanings.sent1: The unaggressive dog wagged its tail happily, showing no signs of aggression.
meanings.sent2: She preferred unaggressive discussions, always seeking peaceful resolutions.
meanings.sent3: The unaggressive squirrel decided to share its nuts instead of hoarding them.
meanings.sent4: The unaggressive river flowed gently, avoiding any aggressive rapids.
meanings.sent5: Her unaggressive response to criticism surprised everyone, as she remained calm and composed.
